title: Starbucks hires former McDonald’s exec Deb Hall Lefevre to lead tech efforts as CTO - GeekWire
content: Starbucks hires former McDonald’s exec Deb Hall Lefevre to lead tech efforts as CTO  GeekWire
description: Starbucks is bringing on a former longtime tech leader at McDonald's as its new chief technology officer. Deb Hall Lefevre will become Starbucks CTO on May 2, Reuters reported, as the Seattle coffee…
